articles.title: Moderna to supply up to 125 million COVID-19 vaccine doses globally in first quarter - Reuters
articles.description: Moderna Inc said on Thursday it expects to have between 100 million and 125 million doses of its experimental COVID-19 vaccine available globally in the first quarter of 2021.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
